title: Samurai Heart
lyrics:
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!
Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!



I know that

You're not listening

Your head is somewhere off in clouds

You keep ignoring the signs

And all my not-so-subtle hints

But it's always the same

Our two brains

One wavelength

Wait, that's just wishful thinking

I bet you don't even see me

Here standing next to you



Lost in the crowd

But I'm wandering lonely

Feeling so small

As I look to the sky

Nobody cares that I'm feeling lonely

More alone as time goes by



Hey! Hey! Can you hear me?

Is anybody there?

When will I get an answer?

I'm searching everywhere

Hey! Hey! This is my life

And my fate's all up to me

Whether I hate or love and smile or cry

This life I'm living is mine



Do do do do do do do wa!

Hey! Hey! Samurai heart!



Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!

Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!

Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!

Hey! Hey! Samurai Heart!



As time is passing

Day by day

It's all the same

Yeah, it's nothing new

And it is killing me to know

That I'll never fit in

Thinking out loud, in this crowd

I know I've found

A way to check my footprints

I think I can walk a little more

More than I did before



Strolling on by

I pass a glass window

I catch a glimpse

Of something in me

But I'm so sick and tired of trying

Cause this world will never see



Hey! Hey! Can you hear me?

Is anybody there?

When will I get an answer?

I'm searching everywhere

Hey! Hey! This is my life

And my fate's all up to me

In so deep a small voice hidden in me

And now it's breaking free



Hey! Hey! Would you realize

That you can't do this alone?

You can't just throw your heart out

And hope to fill the hole

Hey! Hey! Don't need excuses

Cause I'm not giving them yet

I will not run and hide and wither inside

I'm gonna live my life!



Hey! Hey! Can you hear me?

Is anybody there?

When will I get an answer?

I'm searching everywhere

Hey! Hey! This is my life

And my fate's all up to me

Whether I hate or love and smile or cry

This life I'm living is mine



Hey! Hey!

Hey! Hey! Samurai heart!

Hey! Hey!



Whether I hate or love and smile or cry

This life I'm living is mine



Do do do do do do do wa!

Hey! Hey! Samurai heart!
